```{r cars}
read_csv(here::here("inputs/data/survey_unnest.csv")) 
salary_model <- 
  lm(log(Salary) ~ Gender + Ethnicity + Ethnicity * Gender + EdLevel + Age + DevType + YearsCodeProCat + YearsCodeProCat * Gender,
     data = survey_matched)
huxreg(salary_model)
```

  \beta_{4}x_{yearscodepro} + 
  \beta_{5}x_{gender}x_{yearscodepro} + 
  \beta_{6}x_{edlevel} + 
  \beta_{7}x_{devtype} + 
  \beta_{8}x_{age} +
  \epsilon_{ij}
  (\#eq:lm)
\end{equation}
